page.title: 16EDUCATION:LIFE AT SCHOOL
page.content: The bell goes at 3.30.and we all go home.I watch T.V.and have tea.Then I go sailing .It is really good.I go in a GP 14 which is a big boat for four or less people .I go home and then I go to bed . We are having a new school built at the moment.Part of the new school was built about 4 years ago and this is now being extended.The builders are a firm called John Cox from Rotheram. It is very messy around the school at the moment as well as noisy. When the school is finished we shall have a hall for P.E., a kitchen,which will cook our dinners instead of them coming by van from Buuxton,changing rooms, a conservatory,2 classroom areas, 4 homebays and a traditional classroom.When the new school is ready in November the old school will close.
